explains: n. 传呼机；能发出哔哔声音的仪器；导弹遥控员

sentences.en: His beeper sounded and he picked up the telephone.
sentences.cn: 他的寻呼机响了，于是他拿起了电话。

sentences.en: Find a beeper and deposit it on the origin.
sentences.cn: 找到一个寻呼机和存款它的起源。

sentences.en: What is the location of each beeper in the world?
sentences.cn: 什么是世界上每个位置的蜂鸣器吗？
